title: As Housing Costs Soar, Co-Living Makes a Comeback
description: The living arrangements, known as “dorms for adults,” are on the upswing after declining in the pandemic, and developers are adapting to the renewed interest.
dc:creator: C. J. Hughes
media:description: “Co-living took all the stress out of moving,” said Lindsey Tindage, who rents a room in a four-bedroom apartment in Brooklyn.
